verses.t: So they brought{H935} the ark{H727} of God{H430}, and set{H3322} it in the midst{H8432} of the tent{H168} that David{H1732} had pitched{H5186} for it: and they offered{H7126} burnt sacrifices{H5930} and peace offerings{H8002} before{H6440} God{H430}.
And when David{H1732} had made an end{H3615} of offering{H5927} the burnt offerings{H5930} and the peace offerings{H8002}, he blessed{H1288} the people{H5971} in the name{H8034} Lordof the {H3068}.
And he dealt{H2505} to every one{H376} of Israel{H3478}, both man{H376} and woman{H802}, to every one{H376} a loaf{H3603} of bread{H3899}, and a good piece of flesh{H829}, and a flagon{H809} of wine.

And he appointed{H5414} certain of the Levites{H3881} to minister{H8334} before{H6440} the ark{H727} Lordof the {H3068}, and to record{H2142}, and to thank{H3034} and praise{H1984} Lordthe {H3068} God{H430} of Israel{H3478}:

Asaph{H623} the chief{H7218}, and next{H4932} to him Zechariah{H2148}, Jeiel{H3273}, and Shemiramoth{H8070}, and Jehiel{H3171}, and Mattithiah{H4993}, and Eliab{H446}, and Benaiah{H1141}, and Obed–edom{H5654}: and Jeiel{H3273} with psalteries{H3627} and with harps{H3658}; but Asaph{H623} made a sound{H8085} with cymbals{H4700};with psalteries…: Heb. with instruments of psalteries and harps
Benaiah{H1141} also and Jahaziel{H3166} the priests{H3548} with trumpets{H2689} continually{H8548} before{H6440} the ark{H727} of the covenant{H1285} of God{H430}.
Then on that day{H3117} David{H1732} delivered{H5414} first{H7218} this psalm to thank{H3034} Lordthe {H3068} into the hand{H3027} of Asaph{H623} and his brethren{H251}.
Give thanks{H3034} Lordunto the {H3068}, call{H7121} upon his name{H8034}, make known{H3045} his deeds{H5949} among the people{H5971}.
Sing{H7891} unto him, sing psalms{H2167} unto him, talk{H7878} ye of all his wondrous{H6381}
Glory{H1984} ye in his holy{H6944} name{H8034}: let the heart{H3820} of them rejoice{H8055} that seek{H1245} Lordthe {H3068}.
Seek{H1875} Lordthe {H3068} and his strength{H5797}, seek{H1245} his face{H6440} continually{H8548}.
Remember{H2142} his marvellous{H6381} works that he hath done{H6213}, his wonders{H4159}, and the judgments{H4941} of his mouth{H6310};
O ye seed{H2233} of Israel{H3478} his servant{H5650}, ye children{H1121} of Jacob{H3290}, his chosen ones{H972}.
He is Lordthe {H3068} our God{H430}; his judgments{H4941} are in all the earth{H776}.
Be ye mindful{H2142} always{H5769} of his covenant{H1285}; the word{H1697} which he commanded{H6680} to a thousand{H505} generations{H1755};
Even of the covenant which he made{H3772} with Abraham{H85}, and of his oath{H7621} unto Isaac{H3327};
And hath confirmed{H5975} the same to Jacob{H3290} for a law{H2706}, and to Israel{H3478} for an everlasting{H5769} covenant{H1285},
Saying{H559}, Unto thee will I give{H5414} the land{H776} of Canaan{H3667}, the lot{H2256} of your inheritance{H5159};the lot: Heb. the cord
When ye were but few{H4962}, even a few{H4592}, and strangers{H1481} in it.few, even: Heb. men of number, etc
And when they went{H1980} from nation{H1471} to nation{H1471}, and from one kingdom{H4467} to another{H312} people{H5971};
He suffered{H3240} no man{H376} to do them wrong{H6231}: yea, he reproved{H3198} kings{H4428} for their sakes,
Saying, Touch{H5060} not mine anointed{H4899}, and do my prophets{H5030} no harm{H7489}.
Sing{H7891} Lordunto the {H3068}, all the earth{H776}; shew forth{H1319} from day{H3117} to day{H3117} his salvation{H3444}.
Declare{H5608} his glory{H3519} among the heathen{H1471}; his marvellous works{H6381} among all nations{H5971}.
For great{H1419} is Lordthe {H3068}, and greatly{H3966} to be praised{H1984}: he also is to be feared{H3372} above all gods{H430}.
For all the gods{H430} of the people{H5971} are idols{H457}: Lordbut the {H3068} made{H6213} the heavens{H8064}.
Glory{H1935} and honour{H1926} are in his presence{H6440}; strength{H5797} and gladness{H2304} are in his place{H4725}.
Give{H3051} Lordunto the {H3068}, ye kindreds{H4940} of the people{H5971}, give{H3051} Lordunto the {H3068} glory{H3519} and strength{H5797}.

Give{H3051} Lordunto the {H3068} the glory{H3519} due unto his name{H8034}: bring{H5375} an offering{H4503}, and come{H935} before{H6440} him: worship{H7812} Lordthe {H3068} in the beauty{H1927} of holiness{H6944}.
Fear{H2342} before{H6440} him, all the earth{H776}: the world{H8398} also shall be stable{H3559}, that it be not moved{H4131}.
Let the heavens{H8064} be glad{H8055}, and let the earth{H776} rejoice{H1523}: and let men say{H559} among the nations{H1471}, LordThe {H3068} reigneth{H4427}.
Let the sea{H3220} roar{H7481}, and the fulness{H4393} thereof: let the fields{H7704} rejoice{H5970}, and all that is therein.
Then shall the trees{H6086} of the wood{H3293} sing out{H7442} at the presence{H6440} Lordof the {H3068}, because he cometh{H935} to judge{H8199} the earth{H776}.
O give thanks{H3034} Lordunto the {H3068}; for he is good{H2896}; for his mercy{H2617} endureth for ever{H5769}.

And say{H559} ye, Save{H3467} us, O God{H430} of our salvation{H3468}, and gather us together{H6908}, and deliver{H5337} us from the heathen{H1471}, that we may give thanks{H3034} to thy holy{H6944} name{H8034}, and glory{H7623} in thy praise{H8416}.
Blessed{H1288} be Lordthe {H3068} God{H430} of Israel{H3478} for ever{H5769} and ever{H5769}. And all the people{H5971} said{H559}, Amen{H543}, and praised{H1984} Lordthe {H3068}.

So he left{H5800} there before{H6440} the ark{H727} of the covenant{H1285} Lordof the {H3068} Asaph{H623} and his brethren{H251}, to minister{H8334} before{H6440} the ark{H727} continually{H8548}, as every day's{H3117} work{H1697} required{H3117}:
And Obed–edom{H5654} with their brethren{H251}, threescore{H8346} and eight{H8083}; Obed–edom{H5654} also the son{H1121} of Jeduthun{H3038} and Hosah{H2621} to be porters{H7778}:
And Zadok{H6659} the priest{H3548}, and his brethren{H251} the priests{H3548}, before{H6440} the tabernacle{H4908} Lordof the {H3068} in the high place{H1116} that was at Gibeon{H1391},

To offer{H5927} burnt offerings{H5930} Lordunto the {H3068} upon the altar{H4196} of the burnt offering{H5930} continually{H8548} morning{H1242} and evening{H6153}, and to do according to all that is written{H3789} in the law{H8451} Lordof the {H3068}, which he commanded{H6680} Israel{H3478};morning…: Heb. in the morning, and in the evening

And with them Heman{H1968} and Jeduthun{H3038}, and the rest{H7605} that were chosen{H1305}, who were expressed{H5344} by name{H8034}, to give thanks{H3034} Lordto the {H3068}, because his mercy{H2617} endureth for ever{H5769};

And with them Heman{H1968} and Jeduthun{H3038} with trumpets{H2689} and cymbals{H4700} for those that should make a sound{H8085}, and with musical{H7892} instruments{H3627} of God{H430}. And the sons{H1121} of Jeduthun{H3038} were porters{H8179}.porters: Heb. for the gate
And all the people{H5971} departed{H3212} every man{H376} to his house{H1004}: and David{H1732} returned{H5437} to bless{H1288} his house{H1004}.
